title: Executive Order 6034-Authorizing the Appointment of Mr. Joseph A. Kinnahan
content: Joseph A. Kinnahan, who, since September 4, 1923, has been serving in a position in the Post Office Department excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6034-Authorizing the Appointment of Mr. Joseph A. Kinnahan Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361584
